description: Intermediate physics problems with detailed solutions covering all Grade 10 topics. Deepen your understanding of mechanics, waves, and electricity through comprehensive practice problems.

topics.name: Unit 1: Measurement & 1D Kinematics
topics.description: Precision and accuracy, SI units, one-dimensional motion, velocity-time graphs, and equations of motion

topics.name: Unit 2: Forces & Newton*s First Law
topics.description: Types of forces, force diagrams, equilibrium, inertia, and Newton's first law applications

topics.name: Unit 3: Newton*s Second Law & Friction
topics.description: F = ma, net force calculations, static and kinetic friction, inclined planes, and friction applications

topics.name: Unit 4: Work, Energy & Power
topics.description: Work calculations, kinetic and potential energy, conservation of energy, efficiency, and power

topics.name: Unit 5: Momentum & Impulse
topics.description: Linear momentum, impulse-momentum theorem, conservation of momentum, elastic and inelastic collisions

topics.name: Unit 6: Waves Basic Properties
topics.description: Wave characteristics, transverse and longitudinal waves, wavelength, frequency, period, and wave speed

topics.name: Unit 7: Sound and Its Properties
topics.description: Sound waves, speed of sound, pitch and loudness, resonance, echo, and Doppler effect

topics.name: Unit 8: Light Reflection & Mirrors
topics.description: Laws of reflection, plane mirrors, curved mirrors (concave and convex), ray diagrams, and mirror equations

topics.name: Unit 9: Static & Current Electricity
topics.description: Electric charge, electrostatic forces, Coulomb's law, electric current, voltage, and resistance

topics.name: Unit 10: Circuits & Electromagnetism
topics.description: Ohm's law, series and parallel circuits, circuit analysis, magnetism, electromagnetic induction, and applications
